author: Staff Reporter
text: Lawyers in Tamil Nadu and Puducherry would boycott court proceedings and wear black shirts to observe ‘Black Day’ on February 19. P. Paramasivam, chairman, Federation of Bar Associations of Tamil Nadu and Puducherry, said that on February 19, 2009, the police brutally attacked lawyers on the Madras High Court premises, which was seen as an attack on judiciary. Hence, every year the day is observed as a ‘Black Day’ and over 60,000 lawyers would boycott court proceedings and stage demonstration.
title: Lawyers to boycott court on Feb. 19
